title: Protobom: Paving the Path for SBOM Adoption
author: Jeffrey Burt
description: CISA, DHS, and OpenSSF are introducing Protobom, an open source tool they say will make it easier for enterprises protect their software supply chains.
cntitle: Protobom：为 SBOM 采用铺平道路
cndescription: CISA、DHS 和 OpenSSF 正在推出 Protobom，他们表示，这是一个开源工具，将使企业更容易保护其软件供应链。
